location.physicalLocation: Metropolitan Nashville/Davidson County Archives, Nashville Public Library

mods.abstract: A group of people with a young girl, wearing period dress of a by-gone era, standing in front of a carriage, pictured at the 1982 Courthouse Day hosted in Nashville, Tennessee. This civic event took place during the mayorship of Richard Fulton, the 64th Mayor of Nashville, Tennessee, who served in office from 1975-1987. Forms part of the Kolleen Hudgins, Director of Special Events, Mayor’s Office Collection. 1 b & w photograph.

titleInfo.title: Kolleen Hudgins, Director of Special Events, Mayor’s Office Collection
